text: Susan Hayward plays the wife sharply and sweetly. Mason is always good for a glower. And Miss Newmar is a stunner in every sense of the word. According to the script she was once captain of the junior hockey team at her school. So help me so was I. IL GRIDO (The Cry) - Paris Pullman - is an earlier essay in atmospheric meandering by the L'Avventura man, Michelangelo Antonioni.
